explains: adj. 巴洛克式的；结构复杂的，形式怪样的
n. 巴洛克风格；巴洛克艺术

sentences.en: The baroque church of San Leonardo is worth a quick look.
sentences.cn: 巴洛克风格的圣里昂纳多教堂值得短暂留步。

sentences.en: It looks like a baroque palace from Prague or Munich enlarged a hundred times.
sentences.cn: 它看起来像一座扩建了100倍的布拉格或慕尼黑的巴洛克式宫殿。

sentences.en: They gradually stopped performing any kind of Baroque music on the piano, even Scarlatti's.
sentences.cn: 他们逐渐停止在钢琴上演奏任何类型的巴洛克音乐，甚至是斯卡拉蒂的。
